hero.title: Hi, I'm Menno
hero.subtitle: I'm a fullstack developer from the picturesque country of the Netherlands, known for its tulip fields, windmills, and innovative technology. I'm passionate about building beautiful, scalable, and maintainable web applications.

formErrors.emailValidation: Please enter a valid email address

formSuccess.title: Message sent
formSuccess.message: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the side projects I've worked on in my free time.

items.title: Textpanda
items.description: Textpanda is an AI communication toolkit, designed to help businesses revolutionize customer experiences.

items.title: Textpanda x Chrome
items.description: A powerful browser extension that lets users interact with Textpanda from anywhere on the web.

items.title: Textpanda x Slack
items.description: A Slack integration that allows users to interact with Textpanda from within Slack.

items.title: Textpanda x Hubspot
items.description: A Hubspot integration that allows users to interact with Textpanda from within Hubspot. Use AI to summarize support tickets, automatically generate responses and more.
